Self-Serve Task Marketplace with Dynamic Pricing

Join our task marketplace where developers choose tasks based on their interests and skills.

    Why we made this:

    The Problem

    Paying developers per task is better than hourly because it encourages efficiency, ensures clear deliverables, and rewards results rather than time spent, which helps keep projects on budget and on schedule.

    However, constantly coordinating with teams and contractors and determining pricing for every task is extremely innefficient and time consuming.

    Our Solution

    This Task Marketplace lets developers of all skill levels choose the tasks they want to work on. Each task's fee is set algorithmically based on factors like urgency, complexity, and required skills, so tasks just need a description—no need to set prices or assign work. Urgent tasks and tasks for high-value clients pay more, encouraging developers to take them on quickly.

    Payments

    When a task is marked as complete, the payment is held in escrow for about 5 days while a tech lead reviews the work. The tech lead will either approve it or ask for any needed fixes before the developer gets paid.
